sense.def:
Kadar ljudje nekaj naredijo
together
, tisto naredijo v medsebojnem sodelovanju.

seg.quote: They flew back to London together.
You all work together as a team.

sense.def:
Kadar se dve stvari zgodita
together
, se zgodita hkrati.

seg.quote: The reports will have to be seen and judged together before we decide.

sense.def:
Kadar so stvari
joined or fixed together
, se držijo druga druge ali so pritrjene druga k drugi.

seg.quote: Her hands were clasped tightly together.

sense.def:
Stvari ali osebe so
together
, kadar so druga ob drugi.

seg.quote: The fossils are packed densely together in display cases.

sense.def:
Izraz
together
uporabljamo, ko govorimo o skupni količini, ki jo dve ali več stvari porabijo ali izdelajo, ali o njihovi skupni vrednosti.

seg.quote: The two companies together spend more on research than the whole of the rest of the industry.

sense.def:
Together with something
pomeni poleg tistega drugega.

seg.quote: Lee handed over the key to his room, together with some forms and leaflets.
